subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Maritime Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: An inadequate lookout probably played a key role in causing a yacht to crash into an island during a California-to-Mexico yacht race, killing all four people aboard, a report found.
snippet: An inadequate lookout probably played a key role in causing a yacht to crash into an island during a California-to-Mexico yacht race, killing all four people aboard, a report found.
